definitions.definition: The act of applauding ; approbation and praise publicly expressed by the clapping of hands, stamping or tapping of the feet, acclamation , huzzas , or other means; marked commendation .

main_definition: The act of applauding ; approbation and praise publicly expressed by the clapping of hands, stamping or tapping of the feet, acclamation , huzzas , or other means; marked commendation .
